trans-unit.source: Provides caching services to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref> object in order to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 提供缓存服务添加到<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref>为了提高性能的对象。

trans-unit.source: Applications that use this caching mechanism are responsible for invalidating the content in the cache when it has changed.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序使用此缓存机制负责当发生更改时失效中缓存的内容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunCache"></xref> class.
Notifies the text engine client of a change to the cache when text content or text run properties of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref> are added, removed, or replaced.
trans-unit.target: 通知文本引擎客户端的缓存的更改内容的文本运行的属性时<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref>添加、 删除或替换。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> character index position of the start of the change.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref>字符更改的起始索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> characters to be added.
trans-unit.target: 指示的数<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref>要添加的字符。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> characters to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 指示的数<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref>要删除的字符。

trans-unit.source: Signals the text engine client to invalidate the entire contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref> cache.
trans-unit.target: 用信号通知文本引擎客户端要使之无效的全部内容<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref>缓存。

trans-unit.source: Invalidating the entire cache has the effect of emptying the cache.
trans-unit.target: 导致整个缓存失效的效果的清空缓存。

trans-unit.source: The cache refills with subsequent calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting> APIs.
trans-unit.target: 缓存窗体中处理对后续调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting>Api。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting>
